title: Vampire Disco Death Dance
description: Campy cult classic about an 18-year-old farmer named Kevin who works on his mean dad’s garlic farm. All Kevin wants to do is dance at a disco night club. He discovers the club is run by vampires when he meets Destiny Fanger.
altHero: Kevin, a farm boy in overalls, embraces a vampire named Destiny, more vampires in the background dance in unison
alt2: Kevin doing the splits on a dance floor
alt3: Destiny and Kevin with dancing vampires
alt4: a vampire man dancing with two red-headed twin vampires
